author: BBC
title: Newsnight 90: A week of the programme in 90 seconds
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Newsnight 90: A week of the programme in 90 seconds 16 October 2015 Last updated at 19:28 BST
Here are some highlights from the past week of Newsnight in 90 seconds - our very own mixtape.
Newsnight airs every weekday at 22:30 BST on BBC Two. You can follow Newsnight on Twitter and on Facebook - and see more highlights on the Newsnight YouTube channel ,
